Topic.Title: What I See On the Road
What I See In the Park
Chinese New Year, Hari Raya Puasa

Slide.Text: The Chinese celebrate Chinese New Year.
I play with my friends in the park.
My favourite fairy tale is Cinderella.
I am not afraid of grasshopper.
Our national day is on 31<sup>st</sup> August.
Children are very happy on Childrens day.
I go to bed at night.
There are 365 days in a year.
The dolphin will not harm you.
My father drives me to school everyday.
We flew to Japan last month.

FlashCardImage/BI/44/we can see fish

Slide.Text: We can buy books from the book store.
My sister bought clothes from the boutique.
Jason gets a haircut in the barber shop.
Last night, we had dinner in the restaurant.
The vehicles are polluting the air.
The smoke from bush fires is bad for our health.
The used water is dirty and poisonous.
Polluted water is flowing into the river.
There is a pond by my grandmothers house.
